extendedInfo.description: "a casual game that perfectly mixes original gameplay, humor and cute design. Must-have." - appszoom"An interesting little gem of a game" - Droid Gamersâpacks a solid punch of terrific gameplay and great humorâ - Android EntityIn a world of convenience, junk food and flabbiness, one government has implemented a drastic new health plan to end the obesity crisis. And one man has to survive itâ¦ RUN FATTY RUN is frantic arcade action that pits one overweight man against the forces of natural selection. Guide Bert through an urban landscape of hills, obstacles, tough old ladies and his most relentless enemy â food. Run, smash and roll your way home as Bert defies the governmentâs best intentions. FEATURES â¢ 36 action packed courses â¢ NEXT GEN 3D graphics with advanced shaders and FX â¢ A smorgasbord of food temptations with ACCURATE CALORIE COUNTS â¢ Learn to BARGE, ROLL, CHARGE and BODYSLAM â¢ Multiple game endings â¢ Unlockable comic backstory NOTE:  This game relies upon quickly tapping your screen.  Some Android devices are not capable of detecting quick taps. reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Really addictive gameplay with nice progression and great humor. Awesome for when you need a quick game hit. 5/5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite amusing.
reviews.comment: Fun, easy, and addicting..... 99 well spent. Now if only this was real life...

reviews.title: Very funny and great artistic graphics

reviews.title: Brilliant screen tapping fun
reviews.comment: Must stop playing, have work to do! It\'s a \"just one more go\" game. Short bursts of frantic screen tapping fun to save Bert from the tiger. Colourful 3D cartoon graphics, amusing \"death\" end sequences; what are you waiting for?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lol so funny.
reviews.comment: Addictive gameplay and cute comic unlocks.

reviews.comment: Not letting me download on my Galaxy S. Keeps saying on-going then doesn\'t start downloading. Saw this game on GoodGame but now i\'m dissapointed.

reviews.title: sCetches
reviews.comment: Run fatty run is fun and addictive. Check it out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unimaginitive; boring; one-dimensional
reviews.comment: All you do is tap the right side of the screen, and occasionally swipe.  That\'s it.  The faster you tap, the better you do.  But, guess what, if you accidentally tap \"home\" on the soft-keys (e.g., Galaxy Nexus), you back out of the game, and cannot restart from where you left off.  It brings you right back to the splash screen and starts you over.  Absolutely terrible game.  Droid-Life has recommended so many terrible games -- it\'s clear that they are being paid to advertise those games.
reviews.author: A Google User
